WorkItem.Description: Defense is reading right... Dodge Parry and Block are all off, Dodge and Parry less than 1/2 a percent each. I don't see why though.
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtPaladin] All tank stats are just a little bit off

Comments.Message: Are you set to fight an 83 boss? You get 0.6% reduction to all of those on 83s.

Noting each of the stats shown in the image, the 0.6% is exactly what he's seeing. Closing issue as a user misconception.



** Closed by Jothay 10/9/2009 12:44 PM
Why are hit points also off?
Hit points may be off by 10-15 because Stamina (along with most base stats) can be off by 1 due to rounding oddities.
I was thinking that initially but the health is off, in this case, by 14 stamina, not 1-2 stamina. I think the problem is more likely the Base Stamina listed for Blood Elf Hunters is off.

Concerning the Base Stamina, I have attached a second screencap this time showing base stats as well, and both geared and ungeared.  I do note that Base Stamina seems to only be inconsistent when wearing gear, which would suggest a calculation error of some sort.  I don't have any idea how the code is calculating, so I won't try to get any closer than that, of course.
Also, thanks again for taking a look at this issue.
I had to do a few tweaks recently to base stats to get them correct for the races I was aware of. I wouldn't be surprised if there are a few other values slightly off that I wasn't able to test.
The screenshots attached are from the ProtPaladin module, so reassigning for looking at the base stats issue
